TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update the HostilityStatusCode of a ControlFeature in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a ControlFeature with HostilityStatusCode = unknown. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the ControlFeature to HostilityStatusCode = suspect. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the ControlFeature to HostilityStatusCode = hostile. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the ControlFeature message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Battlespace Geometry. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated ControlFeature is interpreted and displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an AirControlPoint (ACP) with HostilityStatusCode = unknown
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the ACP with HostilityStatusCode = suspect.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the ACP with HostilityStatusCode = hostile.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.
